title: The Man Trap
synopsis: The Enterprise crew encounters a shape-shifting alien that drains the salt from human bodies, leading to a deadly confrontation.

title: Charlie X
synopsis: A young boy with extraordinary powers causes havoc aboard the Enterprise as he struggles to fit in with the crew.

title: Where No Man Has Gone Before
synopsis: The Enterprise ventures to the edge of the galaxy, where two crew members gain god-like powers with dangerous consequences.

title: The Naked Time
synopsis: A strange virus causes the Enterprise crew to lose their inhibitions, leading to chaos aboard the ship.

title: The Enemy Within
synopsis: A transporter malfunction splits Captain Kirk into two beings: one good, one evil.

title: Mudd's Women
synopsis: The Enterprise rescues a group of women being transported by a charismatic con man, Harry Mudd, who has his own agenda.

title: What Are Little Girls Made Of?
synopsis: Nurse Chapel's fiancé, Dr. Roger Korby, is found alive on a distant planet, but he has been conducting questionable experiments.

title: Miri
synopsis: The Enterprise crew discovers a planet populated only by children who contract a deadly disease when they reach puberty.

title: Dagger of the Mind
synopsis: Kirk and Dr. Helen Noel investigate a mental hospital where a new device is being used to control minds.

title: The Corbomite Maneuver
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters a massive alien ship that threatens to destroy them, leading Kirk to use a clever bluff to save his crew.

title: The Menagerie, Part I
synopsis: Spock kidnaps the ship's former captain, Christopher Pike, and sets a course for the forbidden planet Talos IV.

title: The Menagerie, Part II
synopsis: Kirk and the crew watch Spock's court-martial unfold as they learn about Pike's earlier mission to Talos IV.

title: The Conscience of the King
synopsis: Kirk suspects that a Shakespearean actor touring the galaxy may be a notorious mass murderer in hiding.

title: Balance of Terror
synopsis: The Enterprise engages in a cat-and-mouse battle with a Romulan ship that threatens to ignite a war between the two species.

title: Shore Leave
synopsis: The crew visits a seemingly idyllic planet for some much-needed rest, but their thoughts mysteriously come to life.

title: The Galileo Seven
synopsis: Spock leads a shuttlecraft crew on a mission to explore a mysterious planet, but they are stranded and face deadly creatures.

title: The Squire of Gothos
synopsis: The Enterprise crew is captured by an alien being who enjoys playing god and toying with their lives.

title: Arena
synopsis: Kirk is forced to fight an alien captain one-on-one to settle a dispute between their two species.

title: Tomorrow Is Yesterday
synopsis: The Enterprise is accidentally sent back in time to 20th-century Earth and must avoid altering history.

title: Court Martial
synopsis: Kirk is put on trial for the death of a crewman, but he suspects that he is being framed.

title: The Return of the Archons
synopsis: The Enterprise crew discovers a planet where the population is controlled by a mysterious computer named Landru.

title: Space Seed
synopsis: The Enterprise discovers a 20th-century spaceship containing genetically enhanced humans, including the tyrant Khan Noonien Singh.

title: A Taste of Armageddon
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters a civilization engaged in a simulated war that kills real people, and Kirk intervenes.

title: This Side of Paradise
synopsis: The crew visits a planet where the colonists live in perfect happiness, but at the cost of their free will.

title: The Devil in the Dark
synopsis: Kirk and Spock investigate a mining colony being terrorized by a creature that turns out to be a misunderstood life form.

title: Errand of Mercy
synopsis: The Enterprise is sent to protect a peaceful planet from the Klingons, but the inhabitants have their own secret.

title: The Alternative Factor
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters a man who claims to be fighting an evil version of himself from a parallel universe.

title: The City on the Edge of Forever
synopsis: Kirk, Spock, and McCoy are trapped in the past and must prevent a tragic event that could alter the course of history.

title: Operation -- Annihilate!
synopsis: The Enterprise must stop a deadly parasite that is taking over a colony and threatening the galaxy.

title: Amok Time
synopsis: Spock must return to Vulcan to marry or face death, leading to a battle with Kirk.

title: Who Mourns for Adonais?
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters a being claiming to be the Greek god Apollo, who demands the crew worship him.

title: The Changeling
synopsis: A powerful space probe, Nomad, mistakes Kirk for its creator and threatens to destroy the Enterprise.

title: Mirror, Mirror
synopsis: A transporter malfunction sends Kirk and his officers to a parallel universe where the Federation is a brutal empire.

title: The Apple
synopsis: The Enterprise crew discovers a paradise planet where the inhabitants are controlled by a computer god.

title: The Doomsday Machine
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters a planet-killing machine and a starship captain bent on destroying it at any cost.

title: Catspaw
synopsis: The crew encounters a pair of aliens who use magical powers to control them in a Halloween-themed episode.

title: I, Mudd
synopsis: The crew is captured by a planet of androids led by Harry Mudd, who plans to use them to take over the galaxy.

title: Metamorphosis
synopsis: Kirk, Spock, and McCoy meet Zefram Cochrane, the inventor of warp drive, who is living with a non-corporeal being.

title: Journey to Babel
synopsis: The Enterprise transports a group of diplomats, including Spock's parents, to a conference, but a mysterious assassin is on board.

title: Friday's Child
synopsis: The Enterprise becomes involved in a power struggle on a primitive planet, where a pregnant woman holds the key to peace.

title: The Deadly Years
synopsis: The crew contracts a disease that causes them to age rapidly, threatening their lives and the mission.

title: Obsession
synopsis: Kirk becomes obsessed with hunting down a deadly creature that killed many of his former crewmates.

title: Wolf in the Fold
synopsis: Scotty is accused of a series of murders while on shore leave, and the crew must prove his innocence.

title: The Trouble with Tribbles
synopsis: The Enterprise is overrun by adorable, rapidly multiplying creatures called tribbles, which cause chaos on the ship.

title: The Gamesters of Triskelion
synopsis: Kirk, Uhura, and Chekov are abducted and forced to fight in gladiatorial games for the entertainment of alien beings.

title: A Piece of the Action
synopsis: The crew discovers a planet where an Earth book on gangsters has shaped the entire culture.

title: The Immunity Syndrome
synopsis: The Enterprise investigates the destruction of a starship and discovers a massive, energy-draining space organism.

title: A Private Little War
synopsis: Kirk must arm a peaceful tribe with advanced weapons to counterbalance an opposing tribe supplied by the Klingons.

title: Return to Tomorrow
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters three disembodied beings who wish to borrow the bodies of the crew to build new ones.

title: Patterns of Force
synopsis: The crew finds a planet where a Federation historian has recreated Nazi Germany, with deadly consequences.

title: By Any Other Name
synopsis: Aliens take control of the Enterprise, planning to use it to conquer the galaxy, but they struggle to adapt to human emotions.

title: The Omega Glory
synopsis: The Enterprise crew finds a planet where two warring factions have developed into parallels of Earth’s East and West.

title: The Ultimate Computer
synopsis: The Enterprise tests a new supercomputer designed to take over starship operations, but it proves dangerously flawed.

title: Bread and Circuses
synopsis: The crew discovers a planet with a society resembling ancient Rome, where gladiatorial games are broadcast on television.

title: Assignment: Earth
synopsis: Kirk and Spock travel back to 1960s Earth to stop an alien agent from interfering with history.

title: Spock's Brain
synopsis: An alien woman steals Spock's brain, and the crew has only hours to retrieve it before he dies.

title: The Enterprise Incident
synopsis: Kirk and Spock undertake a secret mission to steal a Romulan cloaking device.

title: The Paradise Syndrome
synopsis: Kirk suffers from amnesia and is mistaken for a god by a primitive tribe on a planet facing destruction.

title: And the Children Shall Lead
synopsis: The Enterprise rescues a group of children who are under the influence of an evil alien being.

title: Is There in Truth No Beauty?
synopsis: A telepathic ambassador, whose appearance causes madness, travels on the Enterprise, leading to a dangerous situation.

title: Spectre of the Gun
synopsis: Kirk and his crew are forced to reenact the gunfight at the O.K. Corral in an alien-controlled simulation.

title: Day of the Dove
synopsis: An alien entity forces the crew of the Enterprise and a Klingon crew to battle each other, feeding off their hatred.

title: For the World is Hollow and I Have Touched the Sky
synopsis: The Enterprise discovers a generation ship whose inhabitants are unaware that they are on a ship, not a planet.

title: The Tholian Web
synopsis: The Enterprise becomes trapped in an energy web created by the Tholians, and Kirk is lost in another dimension.

title: Plato's Stepchildren
synopsis: Kirk and his crew are forced to serve a group of telekinetic beings who model their society on ancient Greece.

title: Wink of an Eye
synopsis: The Enterprise is invaded by a race of hyper-accelerated aliens who attempt to take over the ship.

title: The Empath
synopsis: Kirk, Spock, and McCoy are subjected to torturous experiments by aliens testing the compassion of a mute empath.

title: Elaan of Troyius
synopsis: The Enterprise must transport a reluctant bride, Elaan, who has the power to control men, to her wedding.

title: Whom Gods Destroy
synopsis: Kirk and Spock are captured by a megalomaniacal former starship captain who has taken over a mental asylum.

title: Let That Be Your Last Battlefield
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters two aliens whose hatred for each other threatens to destroy them both.

title: The Mark of Gideon
synopsis: Kirk is abducted to a planet suffering from extreme overpopulation, where his disease is seen as a possible cure.

title: That Which Survives
synopsis: The Enterprise is stalked by a deadly, mysterious woman who can kill with a touch.

title: The Lights of Zetar
synopsis: A mysterious energy cloud invades the Enterprise, threatening the crew and a lieutenant who seems linked to it.

title: Requiem for Methuselah
synopsis: Kirk, Spock, and McCoy meet a reclusive immortal who has lived for thousands of years and who falls in love with a beautiful android.

title: The Way to Eden
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters a group of space hippies searching for a fabled paradise planet.

title: The Cloud Minders
synopsis: Kirk becomes involved in a class struggle on a planet where the elite live in a floating city while the workers toil below.

title: The Savage Curtain
synopsis: Kirk and Spock are forced to fight alongside historical figures in a battle orchestrated by a powerful alien.

title: All Our Yesterdays
synopsis: Kirk, Spock, and McCoy are trapped in different time periods of a dying planet's history.

title: Turnabout Intruder
synopsis: A vengeful woman exchanges bodies with Kirk and tries to take command of the Enterprise.
